definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)

sentences.english: Paul wants Christians to be governed by common sense that looks out for their fellow brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 保羅要基督徒憑着常識爲他們團契的弟兄姐妹着想。

sentences.english: Now there were seven brothers among us.
sentences.chinese: 從前在我們這裏，有弟兄七人。

sentences.english: And all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia
sentences.chinese: 和一切與我同在的衆弟兄，寫信給加拉太的各教會。

sentences.english: The God who sent Brother Branham and this Message did not change.
sentences.chinese: 差遣伯蘭罕弟兄以及這信息的神並沒有改變。

sentences.english: For whoever does the will of myFather in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.
sentences.chinese: 凡遵行我天父旨意的人，就是我的弟兄姐妹和母親了。

sentences.english: Brother L and H were in front of me at my sickbed that afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 手術後兩天，L弟兄與H弟兄出現在我的病榻前。

sentences.english: Brother L and H were in front of me at my sickbed that afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 手術後兩天，L弟兄與H弟兄出現在我的病榻前。

sentences.english: And Chelub the brother of Shuah begat Mehir, which was the father of Eshton.
sentences.chinese: 書哈的弟兄基綠生米黑，米黑是伊施屯之祖。

sentences.english: Thanks to God for bringing the missionary teams to Fiji. They did open a new page here.
sentences.chinese: 感謝神，使用團隊的弟兄姊妹，爲斐濟展開新一頁。

sentences.english: Please remember brother Eric Lin's ministry in your prayers.
sentences.chinese: 請弟兄姊妹爲林春騰弟兄的事奉禱告。

sentences.english: Please remember brother Eric Lin's ministry in your prayers.
sentences.chinese: 請弟兄姊妹爲林春騰弟兄的事奉禱告。

sentences.english: But the Benjamites would not listen to their fellow Israelites.
sentences.chinese: 便雅憫人卻不肯聽從他們弟兄以色列人的話。

sentences.english: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord mong brethren.
sentences.chinese: 吐謊言的假見證，並弟兄中佈散紛爭的人。

sentences.english: Fifth brother is called Recklessly Rash.
Please contact Brother Jonathan Chung on 9/18 Sunday for the purchasing of tickets.
sentences.chinese: 請在9月18日主日向鍾鎮榮弟兄購買餐券。

sentences.english: And the sons of Meselemia, and their brethren strong men, were eighteen.
sentences.chinese: 默舍肋米雅的子孫和弟兄，都是勇士，共計十八人。

definition: brothers/younger brother/CL:個|个[ge4]/I, me (humble term used by men in public speech)/brotherly/fraternal
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
the old and the young/the youngest member of the family
